summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1616, for the improvement of Sunset Avenue, from Laurel Street to Olympic Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, regrading, construction of concrete sidewalks, extension and reconstruction of existing landings and alley crossings, and the construction of wooden curbs, gutters, box drains, cross walks, and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17179 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
